Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: David Hollis
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice for my daughter at school. Had all the right Software and she loves it. 15 " is good size for back packs

Reviews.Title: A New Lap Top
Reviews.Author: Emily Gillis
Reviews.Content: I had an old HP that was 3 years old and it kept crashing after reviewing consumer reports and reading fellow reviews on this Dell lap top I choose this one. And I love it.

Reviews.Title: what
Reviews.Author: Guy Mayo
Reviews.Content: I think the computer is fine but windows 8 is driving me crazy and the tutorials and support are very poor (on the windows 8 sw)

Reviews.Title: Always by Dell
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Inspiron 15 is worth it the money and more! Nice features, easy to use and a great laptop for anyone!

Reviews.Title: SMALLER THAN ADVERTISED
Reviews.Author: AJBJ
Reviews.Content: This is either the wrong product or I got sent the wrong thing the dimensions are way smaller than advertised.  --so this is way too pricey for what a small computer I got.  Advertised dimensions are-- Item Dimensions L x W x H 19.29 x 13.15 x 3.31 inches.  The one I was sent is 15" x 10 1/2" x 1".  This is not nice!

ProductInfo.Features:
3rd Generation Intel Core i3-3227U Processor (3M Cache, 1.9 GHz)
6 GB DDR3 RAM
750 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 15 i15RM-5123SLV 15.6-Inch Laptop (Moon Silver)
